Html:
Hello all,

Is it possible to display model with camera background? so it doesn't need any marker to be detected for the position.

sample case:

* http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TL62txWNFMY

Maybe it still use yellow marker, but imagine there's no yellow marker.. it only display 3d models at the position we set.
the camera won't go anywhere either :)

* http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9_GwtKZh-c0&feature=related

Maybe it is more like this.. the models only use camera background.

 

any ideas? :)
I'm trying to manage something like that. If i do it, i will explain you :D
